CustomField.formula:
CASE(Scale_Data_Analysis_Experience__c, "Advanced", 3, "Intermediate", 2, "Beginner", 1, 0)+
CASE(Scale_Relevant_Degree__c, "Specialized graduate degree", 3, "Graduate degree with concentration or certifications", 2, "Undergraduate or light course work", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Project_Mgmt_Consulting__c, "Advanced", 3, "Intermediate", 2, "Beginner", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Project_Type_Experience__c, "2+ years", 3, "1-2 years", 2, "6 months-1 year", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Leadership__c, "Experienced", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Written_Communication_Enthusiasm__c, "Sufficient",1,0) +
CASE(Scale_Engineering_Experience__c, "Advanced", 3, "Intermediate", 2, "Beginner", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Extracurricular_Env_Experience__c, "Yes",1,0) +
CASE(Applicant_Score_Adjustment__c, "+4", 4, "+3", 3, "+2", 2, "+1",1, 0) +
CASE( Versatility__c, "Versatile", 0, "Not Versatile", -1, 0) +
CASE ( Relevant_Experience__c, "Yes",1,0)
CustomField.label: Applicant Score Criteria
